text: Jinshi de shenghuo, jiu xiang shi cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, di li de hemiao, ji ren he shengchu suo chi de dongxi——jiu yin zhi er fanmao qilai. Zhidao tiandi chuan shang shengzhuang, daban de hen meili, er nongfu caixiang ziji keyi huode fengshou de shihou, wo de mingling zai heiye huo baizhou jianglin naxie tiandi, wo shi wugu zhi liu xia cha er, fangfu xinjin meiyou zhongguo zhuangjia yiyang. Wo wei neng siwei de minzhong zheyang jieshi xuduo jixiang.
